comment.author: 23206131@N06
comment._content: The photo is mislabeled. His name is Percy D SIVERD. He was the 1912 tennis champion of Pennsylvania. He came from Pittsburgh. I also articles in the NY Times in which he played in Palm Beach. He won that championship in 1912 as well but withdrew in 1913 with cramps.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the tip!  We fixed the typo.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Percy Dwight Siverd (March 6, 1889 - February 14, 1974) was the 1911 U.S. Men's Clay Court finalist and Pennsylvania champion in 1912 I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percy_D._Siverd

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for pointing out the correct name.  We'll fix this next time we update.
